globals.Beginning1: How do you feel about the idea of New Year Resolutions?
globals.Beginning3: Do you think you will accomplish this resolution by the end of December 2017?
globals.Middle1: Have you outlined steps to accomplish your 2017 New Year Resolution?
globals.Middle2: Has your daily routine changed in any way because of your 2017 goal?
globals.Middle3: Has measurable progress been made on achieving your goal?
globals.Middle4: At the time of this survey, we are nearing the end of the month. Does the time of year bear any weight on your conscience regarding your goal?
globals.Middle5: Do you plan to continue your path towards achieving your 2017 Resolution?
globals.Middle6: Does my involvement make any impact on your feelings/resolution progress?
